SEARCH
Package com.ubicua.didas.rest

Class DidasServiceDocument

java.lang.Object
com.ubicua.didas.rest.DidasServiceDocument
public class DidasServiceDocument extends Object
Helper to build a service document JSON fragment from a Keycloak role.

Extracts @context, id, and service entries from role attributes and formats them into a JSON object string.

Author:
Ivan Kuchumov
